# @babel/plugin-transform-regenerator

> Explode async and generator functions into a state machine.

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/plugin-transform-regenerator
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/plugin-transform-regenerator --dev
```
